llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Great! Based on your requirements, I've planned a 3-day trip from Salt Lake City to Burbank with accommodations in entire rooms. Here's the detailed itinerary for your group of 7 people:

Day 1 (March 12th):

* Depart Salt Lake City at 08:08 AM on flight F3846241, arriving in Burbank at 09:03 AM (Duration: 1 hour 55 minutes, Distance: 574 km)
* Check-in at a private room in Dominiques Homesharing (cost: $1099)
* Rest of the day is free for you to explore Burbank

Day 2 (March 13th):

* Spend the morning exploring Burbank on your own or take a guided tour (cost: $75 per person)
* Have lunch at one of the local restaurants (cost: $15-20 per person)
* In the afternoon, visit Universal Studios Hollywood (cost: $105 per person)
* Return to Dominiques Homesharing for the night (cost: $76 per night)

Day 3 (March 14th):

* Check out of Dominiques Homesharing and depart Burbank at 11:15 AM on flight F3850307 (Duration: 1 hour 47 minutes, Distance: 574 km)
* Visit Los Angeles city (cost: $120 per person for a self-driving tour or $160 per person for a guided tour)
* Return to Salt Lake City in the evening (Duration: 9 hours 55 minutes, Distance: 1,118 km)

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $360 (Flight F3846241 and Flight F3850307)
* Accommodations: $156 (Cost of Dominiques Homesharing for 3 nights)
* Transportation: $120 (Self-driving tour or guided tour in Los Angeles city)
* Food and activities: $480 (Lunch, dinner, and entrance fees for Universal Studios Hollywood)
Total budget: $7,600

Note: The above itinerary and budget are based on the information provided in your query. Actual costs may vary depending on various factors such as flight schedules, accommodation availability, and personal preferences.
